title: Diamond Vanki - Modern Nagas Design
features: Features a stylized floral motif at the center. The armlet uses an open, geometric lattice design, adorned with delicate diamond clusters that enhance its modern appeal while subtly hinting at traditional 'Mogappu' motifs. Features flexible joints for comfortable wear.
colors: Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A versatile piece that beautifully complements both traditional sarees and contemporary evening wear.
description: This contemporary Vanki offers a fresh take on a classic design. The brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the sleek gold setting, makes it a standout piece. Its adjustable design ensures a comfortable fit. The timeless elegance ensures it will remain a cherished heirloom.
